description: Try our easy to follow Barbecued Pork recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Barbecued Pork Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place sugar, sauces, wine, ginger, garlic, five-spice and colouring in a saucepan. Stir over low heat until smooth. Place pork into a loaf pan. Pour over sauce from pan. Refrigerate for 1 hour, turning occasionally. Remove and set aside for 30 minutes or until meat comes to room temperature.

Meanwhile preheat oven to 210°C. Line a baking pan with foil. Place a wire rack into pan and add 1 cup of water. Remove pork from marinade, allowing excess to drip off, and place onto rack. Bake for 20 minutes. Reduce heat to 180°C, baste well with marinade and bake for a further 40 minutes per kilo of meat, basting and turning every 10 minutes until cooked when tested. Transfer pork to a board and cover loosely with foil. Rest for 10 minutes before slicing.

Strain pan juices into a saucepan. Stir in remaining marinade and plum sauce. Bring mixture to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Slice pork and serve with plum sauce, rice and greens. Note: You will need to bake the pork for 40 minutes per kilo.
